title: Planet Looper
shortDescription: A fast-paced, single-button arcade game with retro style graphics, made with Godot 4 in under 96 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2025.

sections.content: Planet Looper is a rhythmic arcade game created in just 96 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2025. The game challenges players to loop their orbit with perfect timing to collect energy and avoid crashing into hazards.

sections.caption: Gameplay showing the main orbit loop mechanic.
Menus, gameplay loop, and failure screen.

title: Swinghammer
shortDescription: Swinghammer is a 2D, physics-based hobby and job simulation game built in Godot 4.
